DataElement.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire Past Seven Days Health Problems Affect Productivity While Working Score 11 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation of how much their health problems affected their productivity while working in the past seven days, using an 11 point visual analogue scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire Past Week Health Problems Affect Productivity While Working Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format._The most recent week, including today._question about how much an individual's health problems affects or affected their productivity while they were working._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format.

Concepts.longName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format.

Property.preferredName: Past Week Health Problems Affect Productivity While Working Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.: question about how much an individual's health problems affects or affected their productivity while they were working.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Health Problems Affect Productivity While Working
Concepts.definition: A question about how much an individual's health problems affects or affected their productivity while they were working.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

DataElementConcept.origin: WPAI-GH:Work Productivity and Activity Impairment Questionnaire-General Health V2.0. Reilly MC, Zbrozek AS, Dukes EM., 1993.
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for NRG study CC003 in Rave per request by R.Bonanni. mc 8/28/15

ValueDomain.preferredName: WPAI Effect of Health Problems on Work 11 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used in the Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire with values ranging from 0: Health problems had no effect on my work to 10: Health problems completely prevented me from working.
